dc_title_s: Land grant map of Broadway in Somers Point, New Jersey
dc_description_s: Based on the shoreline and the roadway alignments, this map depicts properties along Broadway in Somers Point. Brick Kiln Creek is on the extreme left, then Broadway; the "vertical" roadway is Goll Avenue ; the next "horizontal" road is Shore Road / Rt 585; and at the far right is Harbor Lane.|Map is very old and in poor condition, information missing and difficult to interpret exact location|Title has been created from what little information is available, exact title not given|No scale listed on map
